70010000106102.description:
Step into the exciting world of baseball card trading with Baseball Card Shop Simulator! Start with a small shop and transform it into the ultimate destination for collectors and enthusiasts. Whether you’re stocking up on the latest booster packs or hunting down rare gems for your personal collection, every decision counts in this thrilling business simulator.

Your Mission: Grow your card shop into a bustling hub where fans can trade, buy, and sell. Set prices, manage inventory, hire skilled staff, and organize epic tournaments to draw in more customers. The market is always changing, and you must outsmart the competition to become the go-to place for baseball card lovers!

Game Features:
• Shop Customization: Your store, your rules! Customize every corner of your card shop, from sleek shelving to eye-catching decor. Create the perfect atmosphere that will have customers lining up to get in!
• Inventory Management: Keep your shelves stocked with everything from common cards to rare collectibles. Balance supply and demand, and make sure you’re always prepared for the next big trend in the market.
• Pricing and Strategy: You’re the boss when it comes to setting prices! Adjust prices based on rarity, demand, or market conditions. Will you offer discounts to attract new buyers or hike up the prices of rare cards to maximize profits?
• Market Trends: The world of baseball cards is always shifting. Keep an eye on market fluctuations, predict which cards will skyrocket in value, and make smart investments to stay ahead of the game.

Do you have what it takes to turn your small card shop into a thriving business? Dive into the fast-paced world of baseball cards and build your empire today!
70010000106102.intro: Collect, trade, dominate the market and outsmart the competition.
70010000106102.name: Baseball Card Shop Simulator

70050000061101.description:
Cook up explosive lasagnas and drift your way to the finishing line with the Pack Lazy-nya!
This DLC contains a kart and a hat.
70050000061101.name: Garfield Kart 2 - All You Can Drift - Pack Lazy-nya

70010000099315.description:
Wildkeepers Rising is a whimsical action-RPG roguelite set in a beautiful hand-drawn world that combines the power curve of bullet heaven games with the compulsive fun of a creature collector.

FEATURES
* Bullet Heaven: Shred thousands of monsters in bullet heaven runs
* Creature Collector: Discover, tame, and train magical beasts
* Runs & Builds: Create team synergies with different Guardians
* Roguelike Runs: Take runs with different Wildkeepers wielding different weapons
* Progression: Unlock new Guardians and items and make them stronger between runs
* RPG Elements: Discover a rich world of fantasy heroes and magical monsters
70010000099315.intro: Tame monsters! Slay waves of enemy hordes! Explore fantasy lands!
70010000099315.name: Wildkeepers Rising

70010000100247.description:
Play together as Lefty and Righty!
In this playful and wholesome adventure, all the plushies in the day-care have gone missing! You get to play as the hands of each kid searching for their furry friends in their own fantasy worlds. Can you find out who or what caused this strange event? Jump, Snip, Grab, Punch and High-Five your way through three worlds filled with puzzles, secrets and challenges!

All Hands on Deck!
Experience a playful adventure where you and a friend lend each other a hand. Whether you choose to play it, online or locally, you can experience All Hands on Deck together without using split-screen!

Handy composure!
Your appearance changes how you can interact within these imaginative worlds. With Rock you can Punch obstacles in your way or become Paper to Grab items and High Five! The trio is not complete without Scissors to Snip your way further!

Co-op tools!
Various tools can be found across the playful worlds, like an Extendable Arm to reach higher places. A Rubber Band to become a slingshot together or mix and match Paint to traverse through paint splotches. Most tools can even be combined with others! Use them to save all the missing plushies!

Customisation is at your fingertips!
Many secrets and additional challenges are spread throughout each world. Buy cosmetics and jump on paint tubes to change your appearances. Can you find them all?
70010000100247.intro: All Hands on Deck is a co-op puzzle platformer game. Use Rock, Paper, Scissors and various items together to solve puzzles, traverse through playful worlds and save plushies!
70010000100247.name: All Hands on Deck

70010000101600.description:
SUPERMARKET SIMULATOR 25 puts you in the shoes of an ambitious entrepreneur aiming to turn a small shop into a thriving supermarket empire! Plan your strategy, organize shelves, hire staff, and meet customer demands to grow your profits and reputation.

Start with a small store and watch your business expand into a fully equipped supermarket, featuring diverse sections, special promotions, and unique products. Every decision counts—from pricing and stock management to marketing and interior design.

Key Features:
- Build and manage your own supermarket from scratch.
- Hire and coordinate staff to ensure customer satisfaction.
- Optimise shelves and inventory to boost sales.
- Design and customise your store to attract more customers.

Turn your supermarket into a retail empire and become a true business tycoon!
70010000101600.intro: Transform a tiny shop into a bustling supermarket empire.
70010000101600.name: SUPERMARKET SIMULATOR 25

70010000102192.description:
Don't be fooled by its cute charm! The journey home won't be an easy one!

Windswept is a love letter to a period of gaming where collectathon platformers reigned supreme, trying again was the norm, and players only had a game manual to guide them.

There are over 40 stages to explore, each with their own set of hidden collectibles, bonus challenges and quirky obstacles to overcome... or fall victim to!

You'll learn every ability in the first stage of the game, after that you're on your own!

Changing your leader gives you an entirely new set of actions to use and master - remember to take your time and things will click eventually...

Making your way home will be tough, and you'll need to keep trying until you get the hang of things - but for those who find it a walk in the park, there's plenty of hidden challenges along the way to test you!

There's no wrong way to play Windswept.
Marbles and Checkers each have unique abilities, but that won't always be enough to overcome specialised challenges... Mix 'n' match different techniques to play your own way.

You may surprise yourself with what you're capable of!
The journey home is a long one - live for the moments as they happen.

After that, they're only a memory!
How far will you go?
Where will your journey end?
Let's get swept away - together!
70010000102192.intro: Marbles and Checkers need your help finding their way home after being swept away in a storm. In this 90s buddy-platformer there's a ton of stuff to do and even more to collect!
70010000102192.name: WINDSWEPT

70010000097132.description:
Hymer 2000 is an interactive text-based puzzle game. You can converse freely with a computer named Hymer, without being confined to a fixed set of text options. The game features an open-ended search function that allows you to enter any keyword to locate conversational logs between Hymer and others. Throughout this process, you will uncover new keywords, gather clues, collect "faces," and ultimately unveil the secret Hymer has been guarding before shutting it down once and for all.

Game Features: 
- An open-ended conversational system free from predefined text options. 
- Enter any keyword to search for conversational logs between Hymer and others. 
- A well-rounded story connected by 80 illustrations of pareidolic "faces." 
- Interactive mini-games based on algorithms, including "Particle" and "Note." 
- An interface that simulates an operating system.
70010000097132.intro: Uncover the secrets of Hope Residence.
70010000097132.name: Hymer 2000

70010000098408.description:
Explore, gather resources, craft tools, knit warm sweaters, bake pies and meet the locals!

In Winter Burrow, you play a mouse who returns from the big city to find their childhood home in ruins. To make matters worse, your Aunt (who was supposed to be looking after it) has gone missing. Restore your broken-down childhood burrow to its former glory so you can relax in front of the fireplace. 

Brave the elements and journey out into the frozen wilderness to collect vital resources for both yourself and your new home. Beware of the insect wildlife and remember that nobody survives on their own; find new friends, expand your survival handbook and solve the mystery of what happened to your Aunt. 

Winter Burrow is a survival game you play at your own pace. Customize your character, decorate your burrow and choose a path that fits your play style. This story is yours to tell.
70010000098408.intro: Winter Burrow is a cozy woodland survival game about a mouse returning home to restore their childhood burrow.
70010000098408.name: Winter Burrow

70010000104882.description:
Play as Bomb Kitten, a cunning black cat in a red cape, in this old-school action puzzler! Blast through grid-based stages, outsmart enemies, and use bombs to clear paths—but watch for spikes and traps.

Collect hidden items, master 50 explosive challenges, and reach the exit ladder to escape these labyrinthine halls!

• Navigate increasingly complex puzzle stages.
• Set bombs to clear a path and eliminate dangerous foes.
• Avoid traps and exploit stage gimmicks!
• Collect special items across 50 levels.
70010000104882.intro: Get frisky with explosives and blast your way through tricky mazelike puzzle stages!
70010000104882.name: Bomb Kitten

70010000105451.description:
Grab your helmet and pickaxe, because Sokomine just got explosive! Every puzzle is a mix of brains and blasts. Push mining carts stuffed with dynamite straight into meteors, blow them to pieces, and collect the shiny crystals hiding inside.

You play as a fearless miner on a crystal-collecting mission. Move through grid-based levels, plan your steps carefully, undo mistakes as much as you want, and trigger fiery explosions at just the right moment. To win, you’ll need to clear every meteor and outsmart every obstacle that stands in your way.

The Sokomine adventure takes you through 30 puzzles spread across three epic locations. Outer Space teaches you the ropes with simpler challenges. Mining Station tests your skills with tricky craters that stop carts in their tracks. And Lunar Lab? That’s where things heat up, introducing furnaces that destroy carts and force you to come up with the perfect plan.
70010000105451.name: Sokomine

70010000105802.description:
Let's play a game. A real game. On the real streets. The rule is simple - score.    

You can't even imagine where streetball can be played. Discover all the locations for your best shot. Want to play at the airport? This is easy! Jump on the planes like it's your playground. Or do you want to break through the glass before the dunk? You can do it here!        

Check out the new fun game from the NOSTRA.GAMES team. 

Play the real streetball in your own way!
70010000105802.intro: This is what real street basketball is all about
70010000105802.name: Dunk Trickster

70010000107060.description:
The Hollow Lighthouse is a story-driven survival horror game that drops you on a remote, forgotten island off the Romanian coast. You’re an electrician sent to fix the lighthouse—but soon realize the light is the only thing keeping you safe. 

Wander through thick pine forests, climb eerie cliffs, and explore abandoned buildings scattered across the island. Strange figures lurk in the woods. An unsettling old keeper watches from the shadows. And something else... something not quite human... is following you. 

The further you go, the darker it gets. 
Fix the light… before it’s too late.
70010000107060.intro: Don’t let the light go out.
70010000107060.name: The Hollow Lighthouse

70010000110345.description:
Collect pieces of adorable Picnic Girls enjoying the fall and complete the puzzle!
There are 15 stages in total.
As you clear each stage, the difficulty increases!
Stages 1–10: 30 pieces
Stages 11–15: 50 pieces
The final stage is a tough one with no background watermark!
Take your time and examine each piece to complete the puzzle!
Once completed, high-resolution Picnic Girls will be added to your gallery ♪
70010000110345.intro: A puzzle game featuring tons of cute Picnic Girls enjoying the autumn season is here!
70010000110345.name: Picnic Girls

70050000053768.description:
Ahoy, sailor!
You can hear the sea calling your name, tempting you with thrilling adventures and long lost riches—but you’re more in it for the aesthetic?
Then you don’t have to wait any longer!
With this AOC you can now dress up your favorite detective-outlaw-duo of Melli and Zephir in stylish pirate-themed outfits! Ready for their adventures out on the roaring sea—or wherever the quest board in the Wayfarer’s Inn leads them.

This AOC includes:
- an adorable new outfit for Melli, your favorite detective—with an additional tail hook for maximum mischief.
- an edgy new outfit for Zephir that enhances their mysterious and dark aura even further.
70050000053768.intro: This AOC offers pirate-themed outfits for your favorite detective-outlaw-duo: Melli and Zephir!
70050000053768.name: Tavern Talk - Pirate Palooza (Costume Pack)

70010000078582.description:
O smoldering clouds, let INAZUMA's lightning split the sky!

The newest title in the hyperdimensional football RPG series "Inazuma Eleven" is finally here!
A new story featuring a new protagonist, over 5,400 characters to collect and train, as well as an intense competitive mode; there is no shortage of activities to enjoy!

■ Story Mode
This new story takes place 25 years after the first Inazuma Eleven.
In search of a world without football, protagonist Destin Billows enrolls at South Cirrus Junior High. Meanwhile, within the prestigious Raimon Junior High - renowned as the top team in the nationals - rises a Football Monster named Harper Evans.
When these two cross paths, a tale begins to unfold...

■ Chronicle Mode
A roster spanning over 5,400 characters from previous entries in the series!
Relive past Inazuma Eleven matches with Victorio, the boy who came from the future.
Take on various teams, collect and train characters, and build your ultimate dream team!

■ Bond Station (Kizuna Station)
Freely arrange nostalgic objects from the Inazuma Eleven series to create your own "Bond Town"!
Customize your avatar, invite friends over and enjoy socializing and playing matches together!
Your custom made avatar can also be used in matches!

■ The Ultimate Anime Experience Brought to Life by MAPPA
In-game anime cutscenes were made in cooperation with animation studio MAPPA!
With the longest anime runtime in the series' history, the story's intensity will reach new heights.
70010000078582.intro: A new era of hyperdimensional football will see online battles ignite the world!
70010000078582.name: INAZUMA ELEVEN: Victory Road

70010000087275.description: A first-person narrative adventure game, telling the story of a sick child playing a 2D platformer. Made in partnership with Great Ormond Street Hospital Charity!
70010000087275.intro: A first-person narrative adventure game, telling the story of a sick child playing a 2D platformer.
70010000087275.name: I'll be Brave, Tomorrow

70010000092160.description: Balance the weight of the GIGASWORD, battling between brain and brawn in this action-puzzle metroidvania where the might of the sword will determine all. As tensions rise in Thoenhart, a city plagued by famine and disease, the humans within set their hopes on a final solution: invade the ancient tower Nestrium, slay the Nocturne, and take the God Crystal, Gnosis, for themselves. Said to grant prosperity to those who wield it, Gnosis has been long sought after by humanity for generations. However, upon raiding its resting place, the disturbance of this ancient power awakens an evil capable of destroying the very fabric of reality. Can Ezra reach the top of the Nestrium in time to stop this cataclysm, or will humanity’s ignorance lead the world to its doom?
70010000092160.intro: Can he restore the world's coherency before it's too late?
70010000092160.name: GIGASWORD

70010000093680.description:
Bibi Blocksberg and her friends are taking to the air again! 
Get ready for new, turbulent tracks and lots of broomstick action. Experience hair-raising races through spooky Transylvania, the mysterious Orient, and the untamed prehistoric world. Whether solo or with 4 players – this adventure will be as wild as a witch!

• 12 exciting tracks in a new combo and 2 hidden bonus tracks
• Daredevil races through 3 magical worlds
• Unlock 8 witches and brooms – with Apple Pie too, of course
• Witch rally, single and team races for extra thrills!
• Fabulous flying fun for 1-4 young witches and would-be witches!
70010000093680.name: Bibi Blocksberg – Big Broom Race 4

70010000094574.description:
Branded a traitor and hunted by the Agency he once served, Agent 47 returns to Nintendo Switch™ in lethal form.

Stalk your targets through elaborate environments designed to reward both quick thinking and patient planning. Strike silently from the shadows, or let your silverballers do the talking — whatever your approach, each of Absolution’s 20 missions is a contract killer’s happy hunting ground that invites exploration, experimentation and improvisation.

MORE THAN A NUMBER
The story of Absolution puts Agent 47’s character under the spotlight, where his loyalties and his conscience are both put to the test.

TAILORED TO NINTENDO SWITCH
Featuring gyro aiming for ultimate precision, Absolution is fully optimised for Nintendo Switch and tailored for play at home or on the go.

KILLER INSTINCT
Use Instinct Mode to identify targets, predict enemy movements, and highlight points of interest.

CLEAR YOUR PATH
Point Shooting lets you stop time, mark multiple enemies, and eliminate them in a heartbeat.

MASTER THE CRAFT
Find new ways to take out your marks, complete Challenges, and perfect your technique.

PLAY IT AGAIN AND AGAIN
Choose from 5 different difficulty settings, from easy to the insanely hard Purist mode.
70010000094574.name: Hitman: Absolution

70010000098740.description:
This edition includes new stories, playable characters, and features that have been added to "Atelier Ryza: Ever Darkness & the Secret Hideout."

This game depicts the coming-of-age story of an ordinary girl named Ryza and her friends as they come in contact with alchemy and set out on a grand adventure involving the secrets of the island they call home.

New features added in the DX version:
• Three new playable characters
Agatha, Kilo, and Romy are now available as playable characters.

• A new story featuring Kilo and Bos
This side story follows Bos as he is chased into the Underworld and meets Kilo before reuniting with Ryza. You can also explore as Kilo!

• A new after story
This story features Ryza, Agatha, and Romy and takes place between the events of Ryza 1 and Ryza 2. Having remained on the island, Ryza now teaches the local children as a substitute teacher and must search for them when they sneak out on an adventure.

• A Custom Combat mode
Select monsters to face and set their levels. You can also change monster behavior, the speed of battle, and other settings.

• All additional content from the original game
Includes both free and paid content, such as swimsuit outfits, photo mode, and additional maps.

• Improved in-game functions and usability
　- Increased basket and container capacity
　- Additional graphic options
　- Improved UI/UX
　- Improved graphics

• Link save data from "Secret" series games for bonuses!
You can link to both the original and DX versions, allowing you to obtain useful items for your adventure.
Note: "Ryza 1 DX," "Ryza 2 DX," and "Ryza 3 DX" all feature different save data requirements and bonuses.

Note: This game is also available for purchase as part of a set. Be careful not to make duplicate purchases.
Please check the official "Atelier Ryza DX" site for details.

• This software can also be played using the Nintendo Switch™ 2. There is a separate version of this software titled "Atelier Ryza: Ever Darkness & the Secret Hideout DX" that is only playable on the Nintendo Switch™ 2. Save data and additional content are incompatible between these two versions. Be careful not to make duplicate or incorrect purchases.
• Please note that this software cannot be upgraded to the Nintendo Switch™ 2 version.
70010000098740.intro: The story of a group of friends discovering things they have never seen before.
70010000098740.name: Atelier Ryza: Ever Darkness & the Secret Hideout DX

70010000098746.description:
This edition includes new stories, playable characters, and features that have been added to "Atelier Ryza 2: Lost Legends & the Secret Fairy."

Set three years after "Atelier Ryza," this game tells the story of matured Ryza and her friends as they reunite and have new encounters, all leading into an important decision. The story of summer and youths begins anew.

New features added in the DX version:
• Two new playable characters
Empel and Lila are now available as playable characters.

• A new story featuring Empel and Lila
This side story follows Empel and Lila as they search for a gate to the Underworld before they reunite with Ryza. Control Lila as you explore both familiar areas and a new map!

• A Custom Combat mode
Select monsters to face and set their levels. You can also change monster behavior, the speed of battle, and other settings.

• Fi will help you on your adventure
Fi will follow Ryza as she moves around the field, providing support. Fi expands the range of the sensor map, restores HP after combat, and helps out in other ways too!

• All additional content from the original game
Includes both free and paid content, such as swimsuit outfits, additional maps and recipes, and more!

• Improved in-game functions and usability
　- Increased basket and container capacity
　- Additional graphic options
　- Improved Spirit Beast functions
　- Improved UI/UX
　- Revised requirements to view events
　- Improved graphics

• Link save data from "Secret" series games for bonuses!
You can link to both the original and DX versions, allowing you to obtain useful items for your adventure.
Note: "Ryza 1 DX," "Ryza 2 DX," and "Ryza 3 DX" all feature different save data requirements and bonuses.

Note: This game is also available for purchase as part of a set. Be careful not to make duplicate purchases.
Please check the official "Atelier Ryza DX" site for details.
70010000098746.intro: Even if my strength is lost, I will always be by your side…
70010000098746.name: Atelier Ryza 2: Lost Legends & the Secret Fairy DX

70010000098750.description:
This edition includes new stories, playable characters, and features that have been added to "Atelier Ryza 3: Alchemist of the End & the Secret Key."

Set one year after "Atelier Ryza 2," this game follows the final summer adventure of Ryza and her friends as they learn about the origins of alchemy and discover the mysteries of their world.

New features added in the DX version:
• Three new playable characters
Clifford, Serri, and Kilo are now available as playable characters.

• A new story featuring Clifford and Serri
After parting ways with Ryza, Clifford and Serri meet again on a deserted island and team up to pursue their goals. Control Serri as you explore both familiar areas and a new map!

• A Custom Combat mode
Select monsters to face and set their levels. You can also change monster behavior, the speed of battle, and other settings.

• Added a Wind Beast which automatically gathers ingredients to assist your exploration!

• All additional content from the original game
Includes both free and paid content, such as swimsuit outfits, additional maps and recipes, and more!

• Improved in-game functions and usability
　- Increased basket and container capacity
　- Additional graphic options
　- Improved UI/UX
　- Improved Spirit Beast functions

• Link save data from "Secret" series games for bonuses!
You can link to both the original and DX versions, allowing you to obtain useful items for your adventure.
Note: "Ryza 1 DX," "Ryza 2 DX," and "Ryza 3 DX" all feature different save data requirements and bonuses.

Note: This game is also available for purchase as part of a set. Be careful not to make duplicate purchases.
Please check the official "Atelier Ryza DX" site for details.
70010000098750.intro: The final summer, the final secret…
70010000098750.name: Atelier Ryza 3: Alchemist of the End & the Secret Key DX

70010000099370.description:
That spark of inspiration changes the shape of the world.

This title, CYCLIA JOURNEY, is a 2D puzzle action game set in a geometric world where everything is governed by the “The Law of Replication & Re-creation”

Players act as a spirit of this world, but the space they can move through is extremely limited. With the power to replicate, connect and rebuild, players can create new areas, reach places they couldn’t access before, obtains keys, and progresses through the stages.

Our vision is to build a unique game where, by immersing themselves in a world built on cycles, players awaken to the hidden patterns that quietly exist in reality..

The beauty of hidden order lies beneath familiar scenery. A journey full of the joy of discovery awaits you.
70010000099370.intro: This title, CYCLIA JOURNEY, is a 2D puzzle action game set in a geometric world where everything is governed by the “The Law of Replication & Re-creation”
70010000099370.name: CYCLIA JOURNEY

70010000099673.description:
Zumba World – The Lost Marble Island combines classic marble-shooter action with an interactive island adventure! You play as a masked tiki warrior, mouth brimming with vibrant marbles. Dash through a top-down tiki hub—sprinkled with hidden treasure chests and level portals—to choose your next challenge.
Once you select a stage, position your warrior at the center of winding jungle paths and launch marbles to match three or more identical orbs. Trigger dazzling chain reactions, clear waves swiftly, and earn up to three stars by preventing any marble from slipping past the ruins’ thresholds.
Every ten levels, dash back into the hub world and venture deeper into one of four exotic island realms—Sunlit Beach Temples, Overgrown Canopy Ruins, Steamy Volcano Springs, and the Sacred Moonlit Lagoon—each with new marble colors, winding vine-carved paths, moving tribal barriers, and ever-quickening speeds.
No two expeditions are alike: discover secret shortcuts in the hub, unlock bonus mini-stages, and collect ancient tiki tokens that reveal the Lost Marble Island’s hidden lore. Addictive and richly themed, Zumba World – The Lost Marble Island invites you to master marble magic and become the ultimate tiki champion!
70010000099673.intro: Dash across the islands—match, blast, and reclaim the lost marble treasures!
70010000099673.name: Zumba World - The Lost Marble Island

70010000100423.description:
The nightmare continues… and the witch is watching.
In Horror Tale 3, the darkest secrets of a cursed neighborhood come to light. As children keep disappearing without a trace, Tom’s search for the truth brings him face-to-face with Wanda—the terrifying witch behind the horror. But she’s not the only surprise waiting in the shadows. New friends, strange allies, and buried secrets emerge as you step into the most intense chapter yet.
Explore five eerie, handcrafted locations that reveal the haunting past of a disturbed child kidnapper. Use your mind to solve chilling puzzles, find hidden objects, and piece together clues that will uncover what really happened in this quiet, snowy town. But danger is everywhere—and Wanda will do whatever it takes to stop you.
This is more than just a game—it’s a psychological puzzle wrapped in horror and mystery, set in the eerie glow of 1990s America. With atmospheric visuals, a haunting original soundtrack, and an unforgettable villain, Horror Tale 3 pulls you into a suspenseful world where every step forward might be your last.
Can you survive the truth? Or will you become her next victim?
70010000100423.intro: Face the witch. Unravel the mystery. Survive the nightmare.
70010000100423.name: Horror Tale 3: The Witch

70010000101260.description:
O smoldering clouds, let INAZUMA's lightning split the sky!

The newest title in the hyperdimensional football RPG series "Inazuma Eleven" is finally here!
A new story featuring a new protagonist, over 5,400 characters to collect and train, as well as an intense competitive mode; there is no shortage of activities to enjoy!

■ Story Mode
This new story takes place 25 years after the first Inazuma Eleven.
In search of a world without football, protagonist Destin Billows enrolls at South Cirrus Junior High. Meanwhile, within the prestigious Raimon Junior High - renowned as the top team in the nationals - rises a Football Monster named Harper Evans.
When these two cross paths, a tale begins to unfold...

■ Chronicle Mode
A roster spanning over 5,400 characters from previous entries in the series!
Relive past Inazuma Eleven matches with Victorio, the boy who came from the future.
Take on various teams, collect and train characters, and build your ultimate dream team!

■ Bond Station (Kizuna Station)
Freely arrange nostalgic objects from the Inazuma Eleven series to create your own "Bond Town"!
Customize your avatar, invite friends over and enjoy socializing and playing matches together!
Your custom made avatar can also be used in matches!

■ The Ultimate Anime Experience Brought to Life by MAPPA
In-game anime cutscenes were made in cooperation with animation studio MAPPA!
With the longest anime runtime in the series' history, the story's intensity will reach new heights.
70010000101260.intro: A new era of hyperdimensional football will see online battles ignite the world!
70010000101260.name: INAZUMA ELEVEN: Victory Road - Nintendo Switch™ 2 Edition

70010000102311.description:
Pursue your quest for revenge... or romance.

Conceal your identity as you seek to punish those who have taken your family and home. 

Are the nobles you meet protecting the kingdom of fairies, or do they have ulterior motives? 

Choose from multiple story paths and complex love triangles. 

Enter a vibrant, living world created by illustrator Karin Suzushiro.
70010000102311.name: Mistonia's Hope -The Lost Delight-

70010000103936.description:
Use Joy-Con™ motion controls to throw exhilarating punches!
The built-in gyro sensors make every hit feel real!

[Score Attack]
Hold a Joy-Con™ in each hand and follow your partner's instructions to punch!
Hit as hard as you can and climb the leaderboards!

[Battle]
Face off against CPUs in single-player mode!
Share Joy-Con™ and go head-to-head with family and friends!
Up to 4 players can join the action!

[Partner Select]
Choose from over 10 different partners who will block your punches!
Team up with your favorite character and become the ultimate champion!
70010000103936.intro:
The arcade's popular attraction, the Punching Machine, is here!
Test your power and become the ultimate champion!
70010000103936.name: Smack it! PUNCH CHAMPION

70010000104917.description:
This game is a drone simulation game that allows you to experience real drone flight based on footage shot by a real flying drone. 
There is no up, down, left or right direction control, only the control to increase or decrease the drone speed. 
You can also change the drone's flight mode from Normal, Sport, and Eco to any of the 3. 

Enjoy the beautiful scenery of Woryeongsan, Korea with "Real" footage! 
There are a total of 2 flight courses in 2 areas.
High-definition footage faithfully reproduces the atmosphere of real nature, providing a strong sense of immersion in the game. 
Smooth and realistic video playback makes you feel like you are a real drone pilot. 
Large capacity! You can fly to locations that show the beautiful scenery of Korea! 
Two play modes are supported: course-specific flying mode and view mode automatic flight. There is also an achievement system. 
Visit Korea from home at any time! 
Enjoy the drone flight control experience and the beautiful natural scenery. MasCon for Nintendo Switch™ made by Zuiki of Japan is also supported.
70010000104917.name: Korean Drone Flying Tour Woryeongsan

70010000105276.description:
The Hidden Cats are back - this time basking in the sunlight in Rio de Janeiro!

What begins with a monochrome scene is going to burst with vibrant colours as you uncover more than 900 hidden objects – playful cats, lively streets, sandy beaches, and famous landmarks!

A cozy adventure that captures the exuberant spirit of a Brazilian holiday… are you in?

Features:
- 900+ hidden objects, 8 unique levels with unlockables
- Collectible cards, achievements, secrets to discover
- Hand-drawn art & original soundtrack with dynamic sound effects
70010000105276.intro: The Hidden Cats continue their world trip in RIO! Let’s search for them again!
70010000105276.name: Hidden Cats in Rio de Janeiro

70010000106291.description:
What is your happy place?
Maybe it's a bedroom. A calm place in the open. Your bathroom. Or maybe... your personal computer?

During times of need, a programmer developed a virtual cozy experience for his girlfriend.
It was a warm, isolated wood cabin on the snowy alps. With a chill-out music playing on the background, a nice place to say for a while...
... if not by a system bug on the basement, showing a hidden path to another world.
70010000106291.intro: A Retro-FPS "virtual happy place", jeopardized with a naughty bug. Traverse this action-oriented roguelite blasting waifus to uncover secrets on a personal computer!
70010000106291.name: Fida Puti Samurai

70010000106966.description: When a remote space station inexplicably finds itself in the path of a large asteroid cluster, the sector's regional guard redirects its nearest asset to help. Working with limited firepower, defend the station from waves of asteroids while minimising damage to your own ship in this futuristic scrolling shooter with a cyberpunk aesthetic.
70010000106966.intro: One pilot, thirty stranded workers, hundreds of asteroids heading their way.
70010000106966.name: Sector Force

70010000107154.description:
Admired Animals – A Quiz Like a Picture Book of Creatures! is a new kind of quiz game where you guess which of four animals is speaking its inner voice.
Each hint comes as a short thought inspired by the animal’s habits and traits. It’s like flipping through an illustrated animal encyclopaedia—use your intuition and knowledge to find the answer!

Wait, is this voice a giraffe… or an elephant?
You’ll enjoy learning about animal life every time you play, making it fun for both kids and adults alike.  

With its educational value, it’s perfect for classroom use too. Play together with friends or family and see who becomes the ultimate Animal Master!

The game supports both button controls and touch controls, allowing you to play in TV mode, handheld mode, or tabletop mode.
※This game is designed to be played on the Nintendo Switch™ in vertical orientation.
70010000107154.intro: Listen closely to your inner voice... and discover which animal you are!?
70010000107154.name: Dream Animal

70010000107257.description:
Climb Jump Obby Tower is your ticket to a wild vertical adventure packed with color, chaos, and seriously fun parkour. Hop, dash, and climb your way through sky-high obstacle towers—one platform at a time.

Three towers. Three levels of madness. Easy, medium, and hard maps are waiting to test your skills in Normal or Challenge Mode. Want bragging rights? Beat the clock and set your best time.

It’s fast. It’s fun. It’s frustrating in all the right ways. One wrong jump and it’s back to the start—so keep your cool, trust your timing, and aim for the top.

Only the best reach the finish. Are you up for it?
70010000107257.intro: You’ll fall. A lot. It’s fine. Probably.
70010000107257.name: Climb Jump Obby Tower

70010000108303.description:
This is a refined version of a 1991 adventure game, with this updated version released by GameCorpus in 2023. Players become Takanoshin Shimmen, who must track down the "Orb of the Sky" stolen from his childhood friend, Noichigo.

The game uses a command-based system for intuitive play. Although there's a slight mismatch between the graphics and the tone of the story, it's an enjoyable narrative.

The original staff expanded the story from 7 chapters to 9 and updated each one. Many new elements have been added, including a completely new chapter, a full remake of the final chapter, new characters, and "Intermission Theater R," which offers mini-episodes of the characters.
70010000108303.intro: The Japanese-style adventure game “Crystal Chaser” has been renewed. A new chapter unfolds in the adventure story of Takanoshin and Noichigo!
70010000108303.name: EGGCONSOLE Crystal Chaser: Overlord's Orb of the Sky - Refined PC-9801

70010000109669.description:
Seven Deadly Sins. Have you heard about the 8th?
Sin Slayers: Reign of the 8th is a dark RPG Roguelite where every choice shapes your fate. Lead a party of cursed heroes through monster-infested lands, survive tactical turn-based battles, and confront the nightmare born from humanity’s sins.

Bear the Weight of Sin
Every action feeds the Sinometer. Choose the easy path of temptation for greater rewards, but beware — the more sin you carry, the stronger and more terrifying your enemies become until the Sin Lord himself rises to challenge you.

Assemble Your Party of Lost Souls
Knights, rogues, witches, nuns — each hero bears their own burden. Equip and train them, then guide them into cursed regions where survival depends on your strategy and choices.

Confront the Sin Lords
Each region hides a monstrous embodiment of a deadly sin. Study their patterns, discover their weaknesses, and defeat them in brutal turn-based combat to break their hold over the world.

A journey of damnation or salvation awaits. Will you resist the darkness — or embrace it?
70010000109669.intro:
A dark RPG Roguelite where every choice feeds your sins.
Assemble cursed heroes and survive tactical battles.
Face the Sin Lords — manifestations of the deadly sins.
70010000109669.name: Sin Slayers: Reign of The 8th

70010000109977.description:
Steal fish in the most magical and sneaky way possible! 

Catnigma is a magical puzzle game where you control a flying cat on a quest to satisfy its endless hunger for fish. The cat moves continuously in the chosen direction until it hits an obstacle, and it’s up to you to use your wits and magical tricks to collect every fish in the level.

Once you’ve gathered them all, return to the Magic Box to unlock the next challenge!
With a mysterious and relaxing atmosphere, original music, and enchanting visuals, each stage feels like exploring a quiet, nighttime home.

Search every corner: living room, kitchen, and bedroom – no fish is safe from your magical cat!

Features:
Creative puzzles with magical portals
The cutest and most mysterious cat
30 challenging levels to discover
70010000109977.name: Catnigma

70010000110152.description:
Get ready for a thrilling parkour adventure! In Village Climb Obby, the once-peaceful village is now completely flooded — and it’s up to you to climb, jump, and race your way through tricky obstacles to escape!

Flooded village challenge – Navigate rooftops, floating debris, and all sorts of platforms.
Fun & fast-paced parkour – Test your skills with jumps, climbs, and daring moves.
Reach the top – Can you conquer the course and make it safely to the end?

Only the best climbers will reach the finish!
70010000110152.intro: Climb, jump, and parkour through a flooded village to reach the finish!
70010000110152.name: Village Climb Obby

A set of 3 poses and 1 frame for each game which can be used in photo mode.

Upgrade to the Deluxe Edition to claim amazing rewards, including a character, decorative objects and a special goal celebration!

70050000064785.name: INAZUMA ELEVEN: Victory Road - Nintendo Switch™ 2 Edition Upgrade Pack

▶ Pre-order Bonus
Jumpstart the training of your characters with the "Advanced Booster Bundle!"

70070000028706.description:
A definitive edition of the "Secret" series, "Atelier Ryza: Secret Trilogy DX," complete with new stories, playable characters, and features.  
This set features all three Secret series DX titles for a discounted price:

- "Atelier Ryza: Ever Darkness & the Secret Hideout DX"
- "Atelier Ryza 2: Lost Legends & the Secret Fairy DX"
- "Atelier Ryza 3: Alchemist of the End & the Secret Key DX"

Note:
- Each of the titles in this set can also be purchased separately. Be careful not to make duplicate purchases.
- French is available only for "Atelier Ryza 2: Lost Legends & the Secret Fairy DX"
- Please check the official "Atelier Ryza DX" site for details.
70070000028706.name: Atelier Ryza Secret Trilogy Deluxe Pack

70070000031670.description:
The "INAZUMA ELEVEN: Victory Road Deluxe Edition" is a value package which adds the following bonus content to the base game.

■ Package Contents:
- Base Game
- Choose-a-Character Crate
- Bond Object: Football Club Room (Raimon)
- Bond Object: Rai Rai Noodles (Inazuma Town)
- Promise Pendant (equipment that boosts EXP gained)
- Victory Jump (Goal celebration)

*For more details on the bonuses included with each edition, visit the official website: https://www.inazuma.jp/victory-road/en/

O smoldering clouds, let INAZUMA's lightning split the sky!

The newest title in the hyperdimensional football RPG series "Inazuma Eleven" is finally here!
A new story featuring a new protagonist, over 5,400 characters to collect and train, as well as an intense competitive mode; there is no shortage of activities to enjoy!

■ Story Mode
This new story takes place 25 years after the first Inazuma Eleven.
In search of a world without football, protagonist Destin Billows enrolls at South Cirrus Junior High. Meanwhile, within the prestigious Raimon Junior High - renowned as the top team in the nationals - rises a Football Monster named Harper Evans.
When these two cross paths, a tale begins to unfold...

■ Chronicle Mode
A roster spanning over 5,400 characters from previous entries in the series!
Relive past Inazuma Eleven matches with Victorio, the boy who came from the future.
Take on various teams, collect and train characters, and build your ultimate dream team!

■ Bond Station (Kizuna Station)
Freely arrange nostalgic objects from the Inazuma Eleven series to create your own "Bond Town"!
Customize your avatar, invite friends over and enjoy socializing and playing matches together!
Your custom made avatar can also be used in matches!

■ The Ultimate Anime Experience Brought to Life by MAPPA
In-game anime cutscenes were made in cooperation with animation studio MAPPA!
With the longest anime runtime in the series' history, the story's intensity will reach new heights.
70070000031670.intro: A new era of hyperdimensional football will see online battles ignite the world!
70070000031670.name: INAZUMA ELEVEN: Victory Road Deluxe Edition

70010000096071.description:
Prepare yourself for the ultimate adrenaline rush with CLAWPUNK, a pulse-pounding, melee-focused 2D action game infused with roguelite elements and an array of badass cat characters. Tear through a fully destructible environment, where every smash and bash rewards your reactive and aggressive play style. Aim for the highest score possible by laying to waste everything in your path!

Embrace the non-stop, "push-forward" gameplay that CLAWPUNK thrives on. Aggressive players are handsomely rewarded with devastating abilities, and while melee combat is at the heart of the game, you'll also find an arsenal of ranged weapons to annihilate your foes and flaunt your power!

Choose from nine fierce cat characters, each boasting unique base stats, primary weapons, and powerful special attacks that recharge based on your performance (tracked by a combo counter). Roam through five distinct zones, the first four of which you can conquer in any order, each designed to challenge you with specific enemy types, from wide-open arenas for ranged combat to tight quarters for intense melee brawls.

KEY FEATURES:
SEMI-NON-LINEAR PROGRESSION: Battle through five level zones, with the freedom to tackle the first four in any order, all starting from a central hub level.

CHARACTER MANAGEMENT: Master nine unique cat characters, each with their own weapons and stats, to tailor your play style.

COLLECTABLE CARDS: Discover and collect special cards throughout your journey, permanently saving them to mutate and enhance your cats' abilities.

AGGRESSIVE GAMEPLAY: Dive into non-stop, push-forward combat that rewards daring players with powerful rage attacks for diving headfirst into the fray.

DESTRUCTIBLE ENVIRONMENT: Explore and defeat enemies creatively, or simply indulge in the sheer joy of destroying everything in sight!

CHALLENGING, YET ACCESSIBLE DIFFICULTY: Enjoy a scalable difficulty system that caters to both rookies and seasoned players seeking a formidable challenge.

80/90s RETRO THEME: Immerse yourself in a 1980/90s cyberpunk-inspired world, complete with a hard rock soundtrack, along with a pinch of synth, and gritty industrial/ambient soundscapes.
70010000096071.intro: Play as fierce feline heroes and battle villainous gangs to reclaim Feral City in this chaotic arcade adventure.
70010000096071.name: CLAWPUNK

70010000102038.description:
Relive the days of past social gaming networks in VIDEOVERSE, a decision-based narrative adventure focusing on character development, friendship and love.

As Emmett, a young video game fan and aspiring artist, dive into this fictional video game era, where the Kinmoku Shark gaming system and its online social network, Videoverse, were still popular. Strengthen Emmett’s friendships, share fan art and browse the lively gaming communities. Make decisions that will change how Emmett grows, his approach to Videoverse and, ultimately, the final outcome!

Will your actions help Videoverse thrive, or will you get caught up in teenage drama, video game fandoms and corporate conspiracies?


***Relive the Days of Retro Gaming

VIDEOVERSE is inspired by 00’s technology and the early internet. The chill soundscape of the Kinmoku Sharkwill uncover memories of your favourite retro gaming consoles.

***Browse Videoverse

Meet a huge cast of characters, unlock multiple side stories, enjoy the pixel doodles, and seek out the truth behind the troubled social gaming network! Personalise your Videoverse experience by choosing your avatar, personal quote and favourite theme.

***Join Feudal Fantasy Fans

Accompany Emmett as he plays the Kinmoku’s Shark’s most popular JRPG, Feudal Fantasy. Swap theories and discover tips from other fans in its exclusive Videoverse community…and find out whether or not Hanzo will be able to stop the evil Nobunaga!


VIDEOVERSE contains several accessibility options:

* Closed Captions
* Clear Font
* Colourblind Friendly Themes
* Sound, Music and Voice Volumes
* Trigger Warnings
* Tip Button
70010000102038.intro: Take a trip back to the days of the early internet and fan forums…
70010000102038.name: VIDEOVERSE

70010000102128.description:
DRAGON BALL: Sparking! ZERO takes the legendary gameplay of the Budokai Tenkaichi series and raises it to whole new levels. Become a super warrior and experience the earth-shaking, limit-breaking power of Dragon Ball battles!

THE BIGGEST ROSTER IN HISTORY
Unleash the strength of over 180 fighters from Dragon Ball Z, Dragon Ball Super, Dragon Ball GT, and selected Dragon Ball movies, all in the base game! Each character comes with their own signature abilities, transformations, and techniques.

Make the destructive power of the strongest fighters ever to appear in Dragon Ball yours!

BREATHTAKING 3D FIGHTS
Engage in heart-pounding, high-speed 3D battles that stay true to the anime and video game series, with breathtaking visuals and authentic combat moves like beam clashes, rush attacks, movements too quick for the eyes to see, and planet-razing ultimate attacks.

RIVALS MAKE YOU STRONGER
Challenge players online to test your skills, enjoy local multiplayer with up to six players on a single console, or connect multiple consoles for wireless play. Experience intense battles and become a Super Warrior with immersive motion controls using the Joy-Con™ controllers.

BLAZE A NEW PATH
Conquer the action-packed battles from the beloved original story, or discover and unlock new encounters for your favorite Z-Fighters and more. Relive your favorite moments from the series through cutscenes you can experience from the perspectives of eight characters!

CREATE, PLAY, AND SHARE
Recreate your favorite battles from throughout the Dragon Ball story, or set up your dream story battle with your favorite characters! Share your creations with other fans and experience the battles brought to life by imaginations around the world.

*In addition to this edition, Deluxe Edition and Ultimate Edition are also available. Please be careful not to purchase the same content twice.
70010000102128.name: DRAGON BALL: Sparking! ZERO

70010000105428.description:
Deep within the lush, dangerous heart of the tropical jungle, survival is never guaranteed — and power is never given. You are the Young Male, an ambitious gorilla with a destiny yet to be earned. To become the true Alpha, you must prove yourself through strength, wisdom, and unshakable leadership.

Gorilla Jungle King Simulator is an immersive animal survival adventure where every choice shapes your legacy. Unite scattered gorillas into a loyal pack, guide them to food, guard them from predators, and earn their trust through battle and care. A pack is more than allies — it’s your family, and its future depends on you.

Face the primal dangers of the wild:
• Survive deadly night hunts by leopards.
• Outsmart crocodile ambushes by riverbanks.
• Confront rival gorillas who challenge your right to lead.

Forage rare fruits that enhance strength and stamina, find hidden shelters from monsoon storms, and protect the weak as your numbers grow. But leadership is more than survival — it’s legacy. When your pack is ready, challenge the mighty clan and rise as the king of the jungle.
70010000105428.intro: Survive the dangers, lead your pack, and become the jungle king.
70010000105428.name: Gorilla Jungle King Simulator

70010000106015.description:
Buckle up for the ultimate test of speed, destruction, and control!
Car Crash Simulator brings high-octane action to your console — combining explosive crashes, wild ramp jumps, and intense demolition battles.

Take the wheel in multiple game modes:
Derby Mode — Smash into rival cars, send them flying, and rack up points with every impact.
Ramp Mode — Launch off giant ramps, perform insane stunts, and chase the biggest jumps.

Every crash counts! Upgrade your car’s speed, durability, and handling, pushing your vehicle to new limits. Whether you’re slamming into opponents or soaring through the air, every run is packed with adrenaline and chaos.
There are no limits to destruction — only your skill determines how far you’ll go. Ready to cause some damage?
70010000106015.intro:
Race fast, jump high, and crash harder than ever.
Turn chaos into fun with every wild stunt.
Master the ramps, rule the derby, and enjoy the ride!
70010000106015.name: Car Crash Simulator: Demolition Derby Madness

70050000060107.description:
The Pre-Order Pack includes the following content for DRAGON BALL: Sparking! ZERO:
- Exclusive new playable character:
  • Goku (Mini)
- Early unlock of the following six characters:
   ・ Gogeta 
　・ Gogeta, Super Saiyan
   ・ Gogeta, Super Saiyan God Super Saiyan
　・ Broly
　・ Broly, Super Saiyan
　・ Broly, Super Saiyan (Full Power)

70050000060108.description:
The DRAGON BALL: Sparking! ZERO Ultimate Upgrade Pack includes the following items:

70050000060196.description:
DRAGON BALL: Sparking! ZERO Season Pass Bonus allows you to summon Shenron in-game to grant wishes for items such as zeni or costumes.

*You can summon Shenron regardless of the number of Dragon Balls you own at the time of use.

*This item is included with all products that include the Season Pass, such as the Deluxe Edition and Ultimate Edition.
70050000060196.name: DRAGON BALL: Sparking! ZERO Season Pass Bonus

70050000060200.description:
DRAGON BALL: Sparking! ZERO Ultimate Edition Bonus allows you to summon Super Shenron in-game to grant wishes for items such as zeni or to unlock playable characters.

*You can summon Super Shenron regardless of the number of Super Dragon Balls you own at the time of use.
70050000060200.name: DRAGON BALL: Sparking! ZERO Ultimate Edition Bonus

70050000060794.description:
The Klonoa Costumes Set introduces two iconic figures from the KLONOA series into the eerie world of Little Nightmares III. Klonoa’s adventurous spirit and Ghadius’ menacing presence collide in a pair of distinctive outfits that capture both charm and unease. 

Wear these costumes to stand out as you explore unsettling environments and face the horrors of the Spiral. A nostalgic nod for long-time fans, and a fresh, haunting look for new adventurers.

Costumes are suited for both characters: Klonoa for Alone and Ghadius for Low.
70050000060794.name: Little Nightmares III - Klonoa Costumes Set

70050000060797.description:
The Nome Costumes Set lets you embody one of the most iconic figures from the world of Little Nightmares. Inspired by the small, secretive Nomes that hide in the darkest corners, this costume set gives your character a distinctive look, both unsettling and charming. 

The costume is suited for both characters Low and Alone.
70050000060797.name: Little Nightmares III - Nome Costumes Set

70070000029668.description:
